resources.string: Please enter at least 30 random characters. You are NOT required to remember the sequence; it is used internally to increase the security of your information.

Thank you for taking the time to tell us what you think about {0}! Your suggestions and bug reports are greatly appreciated and will be incorporated into a future release if possible. You can also e-mail us directly at appdev.feedback@gmail.com. If you are submitting a bug report, please mention your {0} version ({1}) and your OS ({2} {3}).

WARNING: Feedback sent from this app will be transmitted over an unsecured connection. If you would normally use a VPN for your communication, please send your feedback to appdev.feedback@gmail.com using your VPN secured e-mail.
